long_description: Heathered fabric and a screen print with embroidery make the Marmot Libby T-shirt a delightful choice for hanging out, but it's really made for peformance when you need it. Dri-release(R) polyester/cotton blend offers breathable comfort and permanent moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance. FreshGuard(R) fabric treatment absorbs moisture and quickly pushes it through the fabric into the air to minimize odor creation. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection. Marmot Libby T-shirt for women has a regular fit; tag-free neckline reduces irritation. Closeout.
short_description: Heathered fabric and a screen print with embroidery make the Marmot Libby T-shirt a delightful choice for hanging out, but it's really made for peformance when you need it.
